keywhiz.service.daos

Class SecretDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • keywhiz.service.daos.SecretDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.skife.jdbi.v2.sqlobject.mixins.Transactional<SecretDAO>

    public abstract class SecretDAO
extends Object
implements org.skife.jdbi.v2.sqlobject.mixins.Transactional<SecretDAO>
    Primary class to interact with Secrets. Does not map to a table itself, but utilizes both SecretSeriesDAO and SecretContentDAO to provide a more usable API.

        secretId - external secret series id to look up secrets by.
        Returns:

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        name - of secret series to delete from.
        version - of secret to specifically delete.
